column5: We're leaving for our fishing trip later this week, either Thursday or Friday (that's another story), the problem is, on the return trip some of us want to go different ways.  My Dad and me want to head to Haliburton, my cousin back home to the Hammer, my brother to Ahmic Lk for the week (lucky bugger)  anybody from the area (North Bay, Powassin, Trout Creek) have a tip on a safe place to leave a vehicle for a week? A green P, train station, hotel?  thanks in advance Chris
Are you talking hwy 11 in Marten River / Temagami area  ? If so you can park it in my yard in Sturgeon FREE and safe ..
You can park it in our yard in Powassan Chris. Lots of room now, most of the boats are gone.
The northgate plaza is a common long term parking area and right on the highway.  If you park right along highway fence you will be worry free.

Chris, I can offer up a spot in my driveway. It is 3 cars wide and the boat usually goes on one side but it it at the trailer. I am only one minute from the bypass. No inconvenience whatsoever. I'll PM you.
Seems like a lots of people stepping up to help. That's a great thing about the forum.

that's what's great about this site, the great people   thanks for the offer Randy, your yard is in a great part of Ontario   awesome Bernie, thanks a lot, Powassan works prefect, I'll PM you, we'll feel better with the vehicle parked there rather than at a mall or something in N Bay   thanks Nip, very generous offer
hmm, what about the mozie-on inn?
sounds like bernie has a parts car.
Dibbs on the tires if they are in good shape......   Art
oh yeah, some central Ontario hospitality, LOL, the tires are only good for the side of your dock as bumpers,  post a report with pictures of you guys blasting through a farmers field at 130 kph!
Glad to help Chris.Won't have time to strip it out anyway
